summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Solid Waste Utility and litter control; creating civil infraction penalties for illegal dumping and accumulation of solid waste and revising other penalties; creating cost recovery provisions for City cleanup; authorizing reimbursement to the Solid Waste Fund for expenses and charges relating to cleanup; and adding new Sections 21.36.044, 21.36.922, 21.36.924, 21.36.975, and 21.36.980 to the Seattle Municipal Code, amending Sections 21.36.018, 21.36.042, 21.36.050, 21.36.420, 21.36.425, 21.36.430, 21.36.440, 21.36.920 and 21.36.970, and repealing Sections 21.36.022, 21.36.930, 21.36.940, 21.36.950 and 21.36.960 thereof.
